mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna, products WHERE qna.product_num = products.product_num(+) ORDER BY qna_num DESC
SELECT * FROM qna, products WHERE qna.product_num = products.product_num(+) AND qna_num = #{qna_num} ORDER BY qna_num DESC
SELECT product_num, product_name, product_thumbnail_1 FROM products WHERE LOWER(product_name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{product_name}) || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_title = #{qna_title}, product_num = #{product_num}, qna_content = #{qna_content}, qna_category = #{qna_category}, qna_img_1 = #{qna_img_1}, qna_img_2 = #{qna_img_2}, qna_img_3 = #{qna_img_3} WHERE qna_num = ${qna_num}
